sprache.configBadTime: Remove bad files after N days
sprache.configZtmpTime: Remove ZTMP files after N days
sprache.error_root_db: Error: Could not delete the root server from the database!
sprache.error_root_dbmasterdel: Error: Could not delete the master server from the database!
sprache.error_root_install: Error: Could not start the following installation!
sprache.error_root_masterdel2: Error: Could not delete the files from the server!
sprache.error_root_masterdel: Error: The master server has already been deleted!
sprache.error_root_noselect: Error: No servers have been selected.
sprache.error_root_updatemaster: Error: Could not start the update at the IP!
sprache.help_blocksize: Most filesystems are configured with a blocksize of 4096. This means one block contains 4096 Byte data.
sprache.help_inode_block_ratio: Most systems have a ratio of 4. This means 4 blocks have one inode.
sprache.master_update: The servers with following IP addresses have been updated successfully
sprache.quotaWarning: Warning! Whithout Quotas user can upload data until the disk is full!
sprache.root_masterinstall: The master server has been added to the database and is currently in the installation process.
sprache.showt: Only servers with the server type
sprache.steamWarning: Warning! If you enter any data here, it will overwrite the login data given at the gameserver templates!
